attributes.action: Ban Mobile Phones on all public Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban all mobile phones on public transport they are a menace to society as if we can't live without them we managed before mobiles came out. Why people have to shout on their mobiles for all to hear is beyond me. Life is stressful enough without mobiles going off on public transport. So if you want to use your mobile get off public transport.
